# Ambient kitchen demo -- last updated on 6/7/2011
# 'clafouti-begin' recipe
# Simple activity recognition data file

# Spoon
135 SPOON_STIR.csv SPOON_STIR stir
135 SPOON_SCOOP.csv SPOON_SCOOP scoop
135 SPOON_SCOOP1.csv SPOON_SCOOP scoop

# Ladle
132 LADLE_POUR.csv LADLE_POUR scoop/pour
132 LADLE_POUR1.csv LADLE_POUR scoop

# Small knife - scrape out vanilla seeds
137 BIGKNIFE_SCRAPEOFF.csv SMALLKNIFE_SCRAPE scrape-off  # DATA FROM BIG KNIFE FOR NOW
138 SMALLKNIFE_SPREAD.csv SMALLKNIFE_SCRAPE spread

# Small knife - core pears
138 SMALLKNIFE_CORE.csv SMALLKNIFE_CORE core
# Small knife - quarter or slice pears
138 SMALLKNIFE_SLICE.csv SMALLKNIFE_SLICE slice
138 SMALLKNIFE_CHOP.csv SMALLKNIFE_SLICE chop

# Big knife - scrape out vanilla seeds
104 BIGKNIFE_SCRAPEOFF.csv BIGKNIFE_SCRAPE scrape-off
104 BIGKNIFE_SHAVE.csv BIGKNIFE_SCRAPE shave

# Big knife - quarter or slice pears
104 BIGKNIFE_CHOP.csv BIGKNIFE_SLICE chop
104 BIGKNIFE_SLICE.csv BIGKNIFE_SLICE slice

# Peeler
136 PEELER_PEEL.csv PEELER_PEEL peel

# Whisk
131 WHISK_WHISK.csv WHISK_WHISK whisk
131 WHISK_WHISK1.csv WHISK_WHISK whisk

#Bread knife-- data from big knife
137 BIGKNIFE_SLICE.csv BREADKNIFE_SLICE slice
137 BIGKNIFE_CHOP.csv BREADKNIFE_CHOP chop
137 BIGKNIFE_SCRAPEOFF.csv BREADKNIFE_SCRAPE scrape-off

#Tomato knife 142-- data from small knife

142 SMALLKNIFE_SPREAD.csv TOMATOKNIFE_SPREAD spread
# Small knife - core pears
142 SMALLKNIFE_CORE.csv TOMATOKNIFE_CORE core
# Small knife - quarter or slice pears
142 SMALLKNIFE_SLICE.csv TOMATOKNIFE_SLICE slice
